short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The smart meeting assistant that saves you time and makes every meeting count

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Note:** this is an early proof of concept extension that has many missing features and likely many bugs too. As one of our earliest adopters we look forward to hearing your feedback!

BetterMeetings is a smart Google Calendar and Google Meet Chrome extension that intelligently analyzes your meetings and makes helpful suggestions to free up time.

BetterMeetings automatically tracks and analyzes meetings that are setup via Google Calendar and that use Google Meet as a video conferencing solution.

BetterMeetings helps you get time back and make the most of meetings by:
- Enhancing your Google Calendar with structured meeting templates
- Analyzing your week's meetings and making automated recommendations to get time back
- Locally recording transcripts so you can remain present in all meetings

BetterMeetings integrates seamlessly with the tools you spend the most time in at work and runs silently in the background.

How it Works:
1. Install the extension
2. Enjoy meeting template suggestions when setting up new meetings üôåüèª
3. Click the BetterMeetings extension icon to get automated time saving recommendations

Get time back and make all your meetings BetterMeetings. Get started for free now!
